name: DICOM_DEFINITION
description: This table stores single response data that is not tracked overtime for the DICOM Definition (FDD) masterfile. This includes AE Title/modality build.

columns.name: DEFINITION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the record record.

columns.name: DICOM_NAME
columns.description: The name of an Application Entity (modality). This is not the AE Title.
